property.name: data.tx.bind.port
property.description: The port number for the transaction service

property.name: data.tx.bind.address
property.description: The inet address for the transaction service

property.name: data.tx.server.io.threads
property.description: The number of IO threads for the transaction service

property.name: data.tx.server.threads
property.description: The number of threads for the transaction service

property.name: data.tx.client.count
property.description: The number of pooled instanced of the transaction client

property.name: data.tx.client.provider
property.description: The provider strategy for transaction clients; valid values are "pool" and "thread-local"

property.name: data.queue.table.name
property.description: Specifies the name of the table for queues

property.name: data.tx.snapshot.codecs
property.description: Specifies the class names of all supported transaction state codecs

property.name: data.tx.snapshot.dir
property.description: Directory in HDFS used to store snapshots and logs of transaction state

property.name: data.tx.snapshot.local.dir
property.description: Directory on the local filesystem used to store snapshots and logs of transaction state for single-node operation

property.name: data.tx.snapshot.interval
property.description: Frequency, in seconds, at which snapshots of transaction state should be written

property.name: data.tx.snapshot.retain
property.description: Number of transaction snapshot files to retain as backups

property.name: data.tx.janitor.enable
property.description: Whether or not the TransactionDataJanitor coprocessor should be enabled on tables; should normally be true
